entry: Bai Bi is an immortal and a famous professor. Although he is a hermit, but his knowledge of the universe and its mysteries are very broad. He is wise, calm, and can not only cast magic, but also understand the most complex mathematical equations. He now teaches at San Ching University, but he only offers one class a year and only takes ten students, so people do everything they can to attend his classes.
name: Bai Bi

entry: Yan Hui is a renowned teacher. He has devoted himself to the study of the Dao and has always been able to give his best to those around him. He is an arcanist, so he is very talented in magic, but he is berated by his friends because his lazy.
name: Yan Hui
